content.rendered:
Directed by Sudhish Kumar Sharma

Written by Sudhish Kumar Sharma

Cast Amrita Acharya.Muntazir Ahmad. Jeeshan Ali (Imran Hasmi).Kimti Anand.Rahul Avana.Mohit Baghel.Manoj Bakshi.Swati Bakshi.Parul Chauhan.Vikas Giri.Vikas Giri. Harsh Hansraj (Compounder).Mushtaq Khan. Lilliput ((as Lilliput Faruqui)). Lokesh Mittal (Minister PA). Heena Panchal. Hemant Pandey. Mousam Sharma. Himani Shivpuri

Language Hindi

Producers Mahesh Agrawal. Gaurav Bhati. Jaivindra Singh Bhati. Rajesh Gaur. Chaman Gupta. Anil Gurjar. Veena Kumar. Poonam Rathore. Arvind Sharma. Prdeep Sharma. Priyank Sharma. Sunita Sharma. Anamika Shukla

Production Apaan Film. Cine Group Film. Shape Entertainment
